What is the relationship among genes DE at different points in the time course?  Make a heat map!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gplots)
library(edgeR)
```

```{r}
load("../output/TimeCourseDGE_LRT.Rdata")
```

```{r}
names(models)
genes <- models %>% 
  mutate(DEG0.05 = map(DEG0.05, ~ .$table),
         DEG0.05 = map(DEG0.05, ~ rownames_to_column(., "transcript_ID"))) %>%
  unnest(DEG0.05)
genes
```

Load full DGE, will need this for plotting
```{r}
load("../output/timecourseDGE.Rdata")
cpm <- cpmByGroup(dge)
cpm[1:10,1:5]
```

```{r}
cpm.subset <- cpm[unique(genes$transcript_ID),]
```
